name: Cacao, Inc.
description: Cacao, Inc. is a leading company in the specialty food industry, focusing on high-quality cacao and chocolate products. Founded in 2010, Cacao aims to provide ethically sourced and sustainably produced cacao products that cater to health-conscious consumers and gourmet markets. The company emphasizes transparency in its supply chain, partnering with local farmers to ensure fair trade practices and environmental sustainability. Cacao, Inc. offers a diverse range of products including organic cacao powder, cacao nibs, and dark chocolate bars, all crafted with premium ingredients and minimal processing to retain the natural flavors and health benefits of cacao. With a commitment to innovation, Cacao is continuously expanding its product line to include new flavors and formats, such as cacao-based snacks and beverages. The company's mission is to elevate the chocolate experience while promoting sustainable farming practices and empowering cacao farmers. Cacao, Inc. also engages in various community initiatives aimed at supporting cacao-growing regions and fostering a positive social impact. The brand has developed a loyal customer base and is widely recognized for its commitment to quality and sustainability in the chocolate industry.

seo.meta_title: Cacao, Inc. | Premium Cacao Products & Sustainable Chocolate
seo.meta_description: Explore Cacao, Inc., a leader in premium cacao and chocolate products. Committed to sustainability and quality, Cacao offers a range of ethically sourced products.

faq.question: What is Cacao, Inc. known for?
faq.answer: Cacao, Inc. is known for its premium cacao products and commitment to sustainability in the chocolate industry.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Cacao, Inc.?
faq.answer: Jane Doe is the CEO of Cacao, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Cacao, Inc. headquartered?
faq.answer: Cacao, Inc. is headquartered in Portland, Oregon, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products offered by Cacao, Inc.?
faq.answer: Cacao, Inc. offers organic cacao powder, cacao nibs, dark chocolate bars, and various cacao-based snacks.
